definition: (literary) the vast sky/(finance) eventual downturn/poor prospects in the long term
the eagle soars in the sky (citation from Mao Zedong)

sentences.english: He bellows, rends the air with anguish.
sentences.chinese: 他咆哮着，痛苦的喊聲劃破長空。

sentences.english: Look the sky, dead as lightning, and clouds as flat way.
sentences.chinese: 望長空，死寂當作雷電，雲煙視爲平途。

sentences.english: Countle meteoroids will be sent hurtling into the Earth's atmo here at 71 kilometres a second.
sentences.chinese: 無數流星將以每秒71公里的速度劃破長空。

sentences.english: I looked down, see those million in the sky of flowers.
sentences.chinese: 我再往下一看，看見那些萬里長空下的花兒們。

sentences.english: Almost at the same moment a piercing female cry arose in the air in a prolonged shriek.
sentences.chinese: 幾乎同時一個女人淒厲的尖叫聲劃破長空。

sentences.english: Rainbow mark of Han Ya has delimited vast sky, began airborne new course of development.
sentences.chinese: 韓亞的彩虹標記劃過長空，開始了空運新里程。

sentences.english: On a clear night scores of meteors streak the sky.
sentences.chinese: 在晴朗的夜晚，好幾十顆流星劃破長空。

sentences.english: Eagle wings Ao sky, snow-capped mountains and days can stretch.
sentences.chinese: 雄鷹振翅翱長空，雪山綿延可及天。

sentences.english: The air raid sirens were wailing.
sentences.chinese: 空襲警報尖銳的呼嘯聲劃破長空。

sentences.english: Countless meteoroids will be sent hurtling into the Earth's atmosphere at 71 kilometres a second.
sentences.chinese: 無數流星將以每秒71公里的速度劃破長空。

sentences.english: The eagles fly and the otters play, In the land of the Seminole.
sentences.chinese: 鷹擊長空，水獺戲水，那是米諾爾人的家鄉。

sentences.english: Brilliant fireworks reflect the sky, harmony Changning Revitalisation.
sentences.chinese: 焰火爛漫映長空，和諧昌寧展新姿。

sentences.english: The sea gull was beating the air with its wings.
That floats on high o'ver vales and hills.
sentences.chinese: 飄飛於長空，浮上峽谷和山巒。

sentences.english: The surreal beauty of watching lightning strike in the distance.
sentences.chinese: 看到閃電在遠處劃破長空。

sentences.english: If there is brotherliness in our mind, our strength shall break out universe.
sentences.chinese: 如果我們擁有友愛，我們的力量便可以劃破漫漫長空。

definition: Wanli township in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
to wash/to squander/to sweep away/to move/to shake/dissolute/pond
lit. ten thousand fathoms/fig. extremely high or deep/lofty/bottomless
to visit places famous for their scenery
